title: Mulled Wine at the Polling Station?
itunes:title: Mulled Wine at the Polling Station?
description:
What will it take to get voters out for the December 12 election? Paula Surridge, Political Sociologist at the University of Bristol joins Caroline Hepker and Sebastian Salek. Plus, analysis from Bloomberg Opinion's Therese Raphael, and Professor Jagjit Chadha from NIESR explains why all Brexit outcomes will puncture the U.K. economy.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
